string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane4
I received permission to go all the way to #m270010400#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, go to #b#m270010400##k and take out #r999 #o8200004##k. \n\n#o8200004# #r#a35041##k
I defeated 999 #o8200004#. #p2140000# granted me permission. Of course, this permission only allows me to go up to #m270010500#.
If you want to go in further, you'll need to take a harder test... Makes perfect sense, right? So what do you want to do? Do you want another test?
Then go to #b#m270010400##k and defeat the #r#o8200004##k. If you defeat #r999#k of them, I will grant you permission to go beyond that.
Oh well. Too bad if you think it's too hard for you. I guess that's your limit.
You've defeated 999 #o8200004#. That's amazing. I will grant you permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to look back at your 5th memory.
Go on. You should be able to go up till #b#m270010500##k. As you may have guessed, you can't go beyond that. If you want to go further... you'll have to take a new test.
You haven't defeated #r999 #o8200004##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
